short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Kirka game matches are flipped horizontally.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: When the extension is enabled, Kirka matches will be flipped horizontally. Turn off the extension to revert back to normal. Don't forget to refresh the website.
